  • Class
    Description
    ActionType
    The ActionType enum represents the types of actions that can be performed in the game.
    Character
    The Character interface represents the target character in a world game.
    ComputerControlledPlayer
    The ComputerControlledPlayer class extends the AbstractPlayer class and represents a computer-controlled player in the game.
    ControllerGuiImpl
     
    ControllerGuiInterface
    The ControllerGuiInterface interface represents the controller component of the Dr.
    CustomRandom
    The CustomRandom class provides random number generation functionality, allowing for predictable/mock numbers if specified.
    CustomRandomInterface
    This is an interface for a wrapper for custom random.
    DiagramWorldClass
    The DiagramWorldClass class represents a graphical representation of the world.
    DrLuckyItem
    The DrLuckyItem class represents the items used to kill the target character in the game.
    DrLuckySpace
    The DrLuckySpace class represents a space in the game world.
    DrLuckyWorld
    This class is an implementation of the World interface and represents the world in the game.
    DrLuckyWorld.Input
    This class is for reading and parsing the input from the file.
    DrLuckyWorldDriver
    The DrLuckyWorldDriver class is a driver code that demonstrates the gameplay mechanics of the world game.
    DummyController
     
    GameCharacter
    The GameCharacter class represents a game character and implements the Character interface.
    GameController
    The GameController class simulates the game controller for the Kill Dr.
    GameControllerInterface
    This is an interface for the controller.
    HumanControlledPlayer
    The HumanControlledPlayer class represents a player controlled by a human in the game.
    Item
    The Item interface represents an item in the game world.
    Pet
    A class representing the target character's pet and implement the target character pet interface.
    PetInterface
    The PetInterface represents a pet character that can be targeted in the game.
    Player
    The Player interface represents a player in the game.
    Position
    This represents the Position as co-ordinates for spaces of the world.
    ReadOnlyWorldModel
     
    Space
    This represents the space in the world.
    World
    This represents the entire world template and provides the interface for the world implementation.
    WorldHelper
     
    WorldPosition
    This class is for WorldPosition of space.
